title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Savings and Loan Associations, Supervisory Procedure 112 - Conversion of Federal Savings and Loan Association to State Charter
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Savings and Loan Associations, Supervisory Procedure 112

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 410

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
